* Iron Raptor sighed and rolled her optics in frustration, but she knew to that Prowl loved her and was thinking of her safety.
Some how knowing that she was thinking of running off in a completely different direction that they did, fixing it so that her own signature would seem like all four of them while she made sure that the other three signatures weren't able to be detected. The sensor ghosts disappearing so that they would only detect her.
Though, since she wasn't going to exit with the others, she was going to exit through the front door.
With a second sigh she then fixes him with a determined and stern stare, hoping that he would listen to her then despite what doubts he had in his spark.*

" PROWL! Do you think that I'm so incompetent that I can't look after myself?!"

* She shook her head.*

" I know better to let them get me by surprise again. But I just ask you to do this simple task for me this one time and you say, ' No'?"

* She walked up to him and placed a gentle hand on his cheek with a sigh, pleading very visible in her own optics.*

" I know you're worried about me, Prowl. But it's time to think with your head...and not your spark."
